alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued May 16 at 2:38PM EDT until May 18 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT INTO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures from the mid 20s to lower 30s possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts, east central New York and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. &&
